scripts.all: npm run start && npm run epub && npm run html:s && npm run latex
scripts.start: rm -rf output && node bin/html.js && node bin/highlight.js && node bin/pdfify.js
scripts.start:nohx: rm -rf output && node bin/html.js && node bin/pdfify.js
scripts.epub: npm run mdx && rm -rf output/book.epub && pandoc output/mdx/*.md output/mdx/**/*.md output/mdx/**/**/*.md -o output/book.epub --highlight-style haddock --epub-cover-image=cover.png
scripts.html:s: npm run mdx && pandoc output/mdx/*.md output/mdx/**/*.md output/mdx/**/**/*.md -s -o output/book-all.html --toc --filter pandoc-numbering -c ../public/style/style.css --highlight-style haddock --toc-depth=5
scripts.latex: pandoc -N --template=template.tex --variable mainfont="Palatino" --variable sansfont="Century Gothic" --variable monofont="Consolas" --variable fontsize=12pt --variable version='alpha1' output/mdx/*.md output/mdx/**/*.md output/mdx/**/**/*.md --latex-engine=xelatex --toc --toc-depth=5 -o output/book.pdf
